page.title: 01THE KINGSWOOD AREA
page.content: Our block lies in the flat land of the Severn Vale just below the Cotswold escarpment. Most of the land is farmed, with dairy farming the main activity. The Gloucester-Bristol railway line runs through the western part of our block. The block includes most of the village of Kingswood and part of the village of Charfield. About 1000 people live in Kingswood. There is a primary school, a Post Office/shop, two other shops, a Church, a Chapel and a pub. There is a printing factory and a transport haulage firm. The nearest town is Wotton-under-Edge, a mile and a half away. There is a sports centre and a shopping centre at Yate, 7 miles away. The nearest cities are Bristol (16 miles) and Gloucester (18 miles). Kingswood is a quiet friendly place.
